channel.title: Diablo 3, wondering if I should get it
channel.description:
Just got paid for a job ive been doing this pass week and im thinking about spending the play money I have left on Diablo 3 but I am wondering if the 40 dollars is worth it (for the battlechest package) and how well my computer will run it -- I did like Fate(another game based off of diablo(or thats the rumor))
Heres my specs: [code] Computer: Operating System Microsoft Windows Vista Home Edition OS Service Pack Service Pack 2 DirectX 4.09.00.0904 (DirectX 9.0c) Computer Name CHRISTOPHER-PC User Name Christopher
Motherboard: CPU Type Unknown, 2100 MHz Motherboard Name Wistron 303C Motherboard Chipset Unknown System Memory 2816 MB BIOS Type Phoenix (05/20/09)
Display: Video Adapter NVIDIA GeForce 8200M G Video Adapter NVIDIA GeForce 8200M G Monitor Generic PnP Monitor [NoDB]
Multimedia: Audio Adapter High Definition Audio Controller [NoDB]
Storage: IDE Controller Standard Dual Channel PCI IDE Controller IDE Controller Standard Dual Channel PCI IDE Controller SCSI/RAID Controller Microsoft iSCSI Initiator Disk Drive WDC WD1600BEVT-60ZCT1 ATA Device (149 GB, IDE) Optical Drive Optiarc DVD RW AD-7560S ATA Device SMART Hard Disks Status OK
Partitions: C: (NTFS) 142016 MB (86601 MB free) D: (NTFS) 10605 MB (1710 MB free) Total Size 149.0 GB (86.2 GB free)
[ Processors / AMD Sempron(tm) SI-42 ]
Processor Properties: Manufacturer AMD Version AMD Sempron(tm) SI-42 External Clock 133 MHz Maximum Clock 2100 MHz Current Clock 2100 MHz Type Central Processor Voltage 1.6 V Status Enabled Upgrade None Socket Designation Socket A [/code]

item.title: Diablo 3, wondering if I should get it
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

T4_:

If it ever gets released.

well looking at the page again it says “Diablo:Battlechest”

which is really misleading because I clicked the “Shop for diablo” on the Diablo 3 homepage.
So, this actually helps meout alot its not even released so, I dont need to spend any money on video games :d

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo 3, wondering if I should get it
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

there is a buyable option for the battlechest I was also looking and I see people talking about playing the game I just am confused in that matter, it sounds like its already out as it has updates you can buy for it already (the battlechest) but Idk

item.title: Diablo 3, wondering if I should get it
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Fate is definitely not a game you want to base diablo off. Diablo was one of the best games I have ever played. I was not under the impression Diablo 3 was released though…

Read full topic
